channel.title: What Auxy Sound Should Be Used More?
channel.description:
Rain is one where I have never even thought about using. There should be a challenge to use Rain in a dubstep song or something.
Any others?

item.title: What Auxy Sound Should Be Used More?

item.description:
If you turn up the tone and run a quick 8th note loop through it it sounds pretty nice.

item.title: What Auxy Sound Should Be Used More?
item.dc:creator: BobTheGUYYYYY
item.description:
A lot of things that people mentioned here, I’ve used before. Gossip makes a cool lead saw.

Fields, gossip, and strain make a good synth lead trio. You can hear how that works in my WIP track, a remix of Mantine Surf from Pokémon Ultra sun/moon.

Mantine Surf! - by BobTheGUYYYYY [WIP, Project, possible collab] Work in Progress
Any Pokémon fans out there? USUM? https://app.auxy.co/projects/BMVQYw_v267vmjZXkpPA-Q==

(Not intended to be shameless self promotion)

Read full topic
item.source: What Auxy Sound Should Be Used More?

item.title: What Auxy Sound Should Be Used More?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Also, something I’ve found more recently is that Bo is quite a good instrument. I need to be using that one more for sure. I keep forgetting about it though. I tend to overlook most of AP-004 in favor of Silo and June (@blackocean can understand me there ;3)

item.title: What Auxy Sound Should Be Used More?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Honestly, I’d love to hear more Fairy in tracks too. It’s a great layering instrument that adds a spice of flavor, not too much either, and it works well as a square wave sometimes.

item.title: What Auxy Sound Should Be Used More?
item.dc:creator: tornait
item.description:
I think Castle should be used more. It’s a really good synth organ with lots of vibrato for the tone. Not just good as a riser/siren. Oh, and Muffin is a house organ. But that’s not even used in house music sadly… Oh, Cinema and Vacuum. And possibly Journey. Those don’t get enough attention.strong text

Read full topic

item.title: What Auxy Sound Should Be Used More?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Bow, it’s really good when used correctly, like in this song I did a while back. I also think many of the pianos from AP-005 could do with some more love, everyone seems to use Avenue and Suitcase exclusively for the most part.
